comment.author: 68098840@N00
comment._content: This entire series is fantastic.  Thanks so much for all your efforts, I love it!

comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content: translation: Girls in the Dutch Straw Works Company at Helmond. One girls takes the straw mats out of the sewing machine, the other bends the mats into tubes and fixes the ends by using a string. The production is on average 3000 pieces a day
